articles.description: Great Britain's Kimberley Woods wins women's kayak single bronze at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.

articles.description: American gymnast Simone Biles dazzles on her Olympics return and shows she is back to her best three years after suffering the "twisties".

articles.description: George Russell holds off Mercedes team-mate Lewis Hamilton to take a stunning victory in an engrossing Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix: George Rusell beats Lewis Hamilton for win

articles.description: Mark Wood takes five wickets and Ben Stokes clobbers a 24-ball fifty as England wrap up a 3-0 series victory over West Indies with an emphatic 10-wicket win in the third Test.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Mark Wood takes 5-9 and Ben Stokes hits England's fastest Test fifty as hosts win Third Test

articles.description: Paris Olympic Games organisers say they are "sorry" if scenes in Friday's opening ceremony caused offence.
articles.title: Olympics opening ceremony: Paris 2024 sorry for causing offence after complaints

articles.description: Canada's government will withhold funding for the women's football officials banned by Fifa after the drone spying scandal at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Canada football drone scandal - government pulls Bev Priestman funding

articles.description: British medal hopefuls Rosie Eccles and Chelsie Giles suffer shock early defeats on the second day of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Rosie Eccles and Chelsie Giles suffer shock defeats for Team GB
